list.name: Default
list.comment: Saving motor positions after calibration done. Introduced global "busy" flag (multiprocessing.Event) into Instrument class. FileSequence: get_prefixes() returns known prefixes. reload() now checks for well-known prefixes ('crd', 'tst', 'scn'), and establish an entry in _lastfsn even if no files are present. Interpreter: is_busy() member function (True if a command is running). SampleStore: corrected loading of legacy file format. Gui.core: started coding plotimage. Gui.measurement: singleexposure GUI Gui.setup: resolved a glitch in editconfig. An exception was raised every time the window was hidden and reopened. Gui.sampleedit: working

task.summary: One glade file for one dialog. setup.py created with correct resource file handling. some bugs fixed. test scripts moved to a separate folder. main window of gui works. Menus not yet.

Corrected two glitches in motor movements: - incorrect synchronization between background and foreground processes resulted in not saving the motor positions - very small motor movements (0.001) did not emit a 'stop' signal.

New function: info_message() in toolwindow.py Editconfig mostly works. Started coding sample editor. Redesigned corresponding .glade file to include the sample list and sample editor in the same window.

MESSAGE.value: One glade file for one dialog. setup.py created with correct resource file handling. some bugs fixed. test scripts moved to a separate folder. main window of gui works. Menus not yet.

Corrected two glitches in motor movements: - incorrect synchronization between background and foreground processes resulted in not saving the motor positions - very small motor movements (0.001) did not emit a 'stop' signal.

New function: info_message() in toolwindow.py Editconfig mostly works. Started coding sample editor. Redesigned corresponding .glade file to include the sample list and sample editor in the same window.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
